title: League Of Legends Files Are Corrupt

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body:
Help!
Everytime I go to open league when there is a new patch it always stars downloading it, then stopping completely at basically 98%. When I restart league to make it update again it shows up with this. 'Your League Of Legends files are corrupt, a repair will be started to fix the issue. If you continue to experience this issue, contact player support'-(see link)

replies.body: ive also tried reinstalling league but after a new patch I have to install it again because of this
